Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: @kAOs716  if you are using native mode, the same wallet.dat will be used. Use this guide to create a new lite mode address in Verus Agama - https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029948-create-new-address-in-lite-mode-with-verus-agama

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: Once funds are moved you can exit Agama, and rename the wallet.dat

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: A new one will be generated next time you start in Native mode

Author: kAOs716#3781
Content:
@polycryptoblog  I downloaded the Direct link - https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview as suggested on the Komodo support site. You are aware that there is no "install/uninstall" per se but merely extracted files and the executable... when you run it then some additional folders are created on W10 in ../AppData/Roaming/... with coins/chainstates/etc
@smk762 -  dracocanis ominator  let me give that process a look...

Author: jspook16#3059
Content: How does one transfer NINJA?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: If you have created a new R-Address in Verus Agama, you can send any asset chains using R-addresses to it. It may not be visible in Verus Agama, but as long as you have the private key for the address is will exist within it. This can be confirmed by searching the address at https://dexstats.info/assetviewer.php
